physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#385 Pueblo - 1921 (Negatives for #383, #384, #385 are combined in one envelope) B18." On back of photograph: "Pueblo Co. Union Ave. after flood of 1921. Credit Steele, Photographer Pueblo. Donor Mrs. Ruth Stein." On front of photograph: "Union Ave at O Street Pueblo - 6-6-21, 41 Steele."

mods.abstract: Street view of the aftermath of the Pueblo Flood from the corner of Union Ave and O Street.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
